description:
*This DLC is also included in "Additional Card Pass" which is on sale. It is possible to purchase both individual "Additional Card Sets" and "Additional Card Pass", but the acquisition of included contents will only be reflected once..

Cards from Booster Pack “[D-LBT03]:Lyrical Monasterio ~Summertime Memories!~” and some other PR cards will be unlocked. Additional cards can be obtained by buying pack “[D-LBT03]:Lyrical Monasterio ~Summertime Memories!~” via in-game shop or by crafting. 
*Those PR cards are also included in this pack. 

[INCLUDED PR CARDS]
・D-PR/342EN Looking Up Pranks, Azumy
・D-PR/354EN Light that Shines on Solitude
・D-PR/333EN Relation Weaver, Petrarca


For more details on upcoming cards, please check the latest list for "Additional Card Set Vol.2 [D-LBT03]:Lyrical Monasterio ~Summertime Memories!~" on the Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days official website.
name: Additional Card Set Vol.2 [D-LBT03]: Lyrical Monasterio ~Summertime Memories!~
